Also, given how rageblade and how Jhin in general works, Jhin doesn't only 1 shot people after full stack (I mean he trades sustained DPS (let's not talk about bursts per seconds just yet) for 1 shot after all), it just makes him 1 shot better. And it's not like AA'ing 6 times before running into fights is some big price to begin with, it's basically not that much different than Dark Harvest.

I don't see how I implied that but that's besides the point.

Dark harvest has a 300s timer once you hit enough stacks which is the same time this jhin build is up and running.

The issue with rage blade is that stacks last for 5 secs and his reload is 2.5 which means he has to find a target to hit in 2.5 seconds.

This is not ideal depending on who he wants to hit. 

Also the whole he can stack off minions. Depending on if he uses his q or stattik shiv to clear the wave, yes I know the damage was nerfed, he may not be able to stack on a wave. And that doesn't even include any teammates wanting the wave. 

I'm just saying it takes a lot of pieces coming in to place to happen and is not as broken as it sounds.
No it doesn't, because he can stack on mere creeps
Its not like blood thirster shield, it's hard to keep stacked, especially on jhin.
